articles.title: In an about-face, Germany plans to build Europe's biggest military - NPR
articles.description: A new Trump presidency and the Ukraine war have pushed Germany to change its constitution to spend more on its military. "Building up our military is our top priority," said Chancellor Friedrich Merz.
articles.content: BERLIN Six weeks into his current term in office, President Trump was asked by a reporter about countries, like Germany, that for decades had not spent 2% of their GDPs on defense despite, like all N… [+5079 chars]
